name: A Sassy Sacrifice
description:
Description of the Game 

Aim: To get Queen (purple creature) to the flag (to safe her to the nest)

- by building walls or bridges with brown creatures

Tool: Mouse

Roles:

1. Brown Creatures:

- select them with a mouse click and decide where to move them with a mouse click

- are able to climb on each other (for building walls)

- are able to stick to each other (for building bridges)

2. Purple Creature (Queen)

- is only able to go straight

- select her with mouse click and decide where to move with a mouse click
